title: Supported OS versions
custom_preconds: Given the user has the app installed on a device running Android OS 8.0 or higher

custom_steps_separated.content:
When the user launches an MLB.TV feed
and taps the device home button
custom_steps_separated.expected:
Then Picture in Picture should launch automatically
and the feed should continue to play in the PiP window
and the app should not crash

custom_steps_separated.content:
When the user launches a video highlight from anywhere in the app
(Video Index, Video in News article, Scoreboard highlights, Gameday video - check each)
and taps the device home button
custom_steps_separated.expected:
Then Picture in Picture should launch automatically
and the video highlight should continue to play in the PiP window
and the app should not crash

title: Older OS versions
custom_preconds: Given the user has the app installed on a device running an Android OS version lower than 8.0

custom_steps_separated.content:
When the user launches an MLB.TV feed or VOD content
(check for both)
custom_steps_separated.expected: Then the video will play as usual and without issue

custom_steps_separated.content:
When the user is playing MLB.TV or VOD content on the device
and taps the device home button
custom_steps_separated.expected:
Then the app will be backgrounded
and the video and its audio will stop playing
and the app will not crash

title: Activating PiP Mode
custom_preconds: Given the user has the app installed on a device running OS 8.0 or higher

custom_steps_separated.content:
When the user has launched any sort of video content from the app
and taps the home button
custom_steps_separated.expected:
Then Picture in Picture mode will be activated
and the video will continue to play without interruption at the same volume

title: Video Controls
custom_preconds: Given the user has the app installed on a device running OS 8.0 or higher

custom_steps_separated.content: When the user has launched video and taps the home button to activate PiP mode
custom_steps_separated.expected: Then the user will not see any video controls in the PiP window on launch

custom_steps_separated.content: When the user taps the PiP window
custom_steps_separated.expected:
Then the user will see controls for closing the PiP window, mute, and play/pause as an overlay
and these controls should only be displayed when the PiP window is active

custom_steps_separated.content: When the user taps to another area of the device
custom_steps_separated.expected: Then the controls will not be displayed

custom_steps_separated.content: When the user taps the mute button in the PiP window
custom_steps_separated.expected: Then the PiP video's audio will mute

custom_steps_separated.content:
When the user taps the audio button in the PiP window
while the audio is muted
custom_steps_separated.expected: Then the PiP video's audio will be un-muted

custom_steps_separated.content: When the user taps the pause button in the PiP window
custom_steps_separated.expected: Then the PiP video will be paused

custom_steps_separated.content: When the user taps the play button in the PiP window
custom_steps_separated.expected: Then the PiP video will begin playing from the paused point

custom_steps_separated.content: When the user taps to close the PiP window
custom_steps_separated.expected:
Then the PiP window will close
and the video's playback and audio will stop as well

custom_steps_separated.content: When the user tries to drag the PiP window
custom_steps_separated.expected: Then the user will be able to drag the window and place it anywhere desired on the screen

custom_steps_separated.content: When the user taps the PiP window once
custom_steps_separated.expected: Then the PiP window will be enlarged

custom_steps_separated.content: When the user taps the enlarged PiP window
custom_steps_separated.expected: Then the video will be brought back to the foreground in fullscreen mode

title: Phone Call
custom_preconds:
Given At Bat is installed on a device running OS version 8.0 or higher
and the user has PiP mode activated with an At Bat video

custom_steps_separated.content: When the user receives a phone call
custom_steps_separated.expected: Then the PiP video will pause

custom_steps_separated.content: When the user accepts the phone call
custom_steps_separated.expected: Then the PiP video will remain paused

custom_steps_separated.content: When the user ends the phone call
custom_steps_separated.expected: Then the PiP video will remain paused until the user reactivates it with controls.

custom_steps_separated.content: When the user receives a phone call and declines it
custom_steps_separated.expected:
Then the PiP video will pause when the call is received
and then remain paused until the user reactivates it with controls when the call is declined

title: MLB.TV PiP Button
custom_preconds: Given At Bat is installed on a device running an OS version 8.0 or higher

custom_steps_separated.content: When the user is viewing an MLB.TV feed in At Bat
custom_steps_separated.expected: Then there will be a PiP button available in the media player

custom_steps_separated.content: When the user taps the PiP button
custom_steps_separated.expected:
Then the MLB.TV feed will be sent to a PiP window 
while the user is returned to their previous location in At Bat in the foreground

custom_steps_separated.content: When the user is in the app while the PiP window is active
custom_steps_separated.expected: Then the user will be able to navigate through the app without issue

title: VOD PiP Button
custom_preconds: Given At Bat is installed on a device running an OS version 8.0 or higher

custom_steps_separated.content: When the user is viewing any VOD content in At Bat
custom_steps_separated.expected: Then there will be a PiP button available in the media player

custom_steps_separated.content: When the user taps the PiP button
custom_steps_separated.expected:
Then the VOD content will be sent to a PiP window 
while the user is returned to their previous location in At Bat in the foreground

custom_steps_separated.content: When the user is in the app while the PiP window is active
custom_steps_separated.expected: Then the user will be able to navigate through the app without issue

title: MLB Network & Ad-Hoc Streams
custom_preconds: Given At Bat is installed on a device running an OS version 8.0 or higher

custom_steps_separated.content: When the user is viewing the MLB Network linear stream in At Bat
custom_steps_separated.expected: Then there will be a PiP button available in the media player

custom_steps_separated.content: When the user taps the PiP button
custom_steps_separated.expected:
Then the MLBN stream will be sent to a PiP window 
while the user is returned to their previous location in At Bat in the foreground

custom_steps_separated.content:
When the user is viewing an ad-hoc stream in At Bat
(i.e. Live Look-in, video launched from CMS banner, video launched from News Index)
custom_steps_separated.expected: Then there will be a PiP button available in the media player

custom_steps_separated.content: When the user taps the PiP button
custom_steps_separated.expected:
Then the ad-hoc stream will be sent to a PiP window 
while the user is returned to their previous location in At Bat in the foreground

custom_steps_separated.content: When the user is in the app while the PiP window is active
custom_steps_separated.expected: Then the user will be able to navigate through the app without issue

title: Gameday Audio
custom_preconds: Given At Bat is installed on a device running an OS version 8.0 or higher

custom_steps_separated.content:
When the user has activated PiP mode and has the app in the foreground
and launches a Gameday Audio feed
custom_steps_separated.expected:
Then the PiP video will pause
and the Gameday Audio feed will play

custom_steps_separated.content:
When the user has Gameday Audio playing
and taps the Play button in the PiP window
custom_steps_separated.expected:
Then the Gameday Audio feed will pause
and the PiP video will begin to play from the paused moment

title: Launching another MLB.TV feed
custom_preconds:
Given At Bat is installed on a device running OS 8.0 or higher
and the user has activated PiP mode with an MLB.TV feed

custom_steps_separated.content: When the user re-launches the app from the device home screen or app folder
custom_steps_separated.expected:
Then depending on what activity they were in when they sent the previous video to the PiP window, 
they will see that activity

custom_steps_separated.content: When the user taps to launch another MLB.TV feed, while the original MLB.TV feed is in PiP mode
custom_steps_separated.expected:
Then the PiP window will maximize to full screen
and the newly selected MLB.TV feed will load and begin to play in full screen

custom_steps_separated.content: When the user taps to launch the same MLB.TV feed, while the original MLB.TV feed is in PiP mode
custom_steps_separated.expected:
Then the PiP window will maximize to full screen
and the newly selected MLB.TV feed will load and begin to play in full screen

custom_steps_separated.content: When the user taps the back button while the newly selected MLB.TV feed is playing in full screen
custom_steps_separated.expected: Then the user will be brought back to where they had launched the new feed

custom_steps_separated.content: When the user taps the back button a second time
custom_steps_separated.expected: Then the stack will pop as should be intuitively expected

custom_steps_separated.content: When the user taps to launch any other type of video during their app session
custom_steps_separated.expected:
Then the video will launch without issue
and the app will not crash

title: Launching VOD content
custom_preconds:
Given At Bat is installed on a device running OS 8.0 or higher
and the user has activated PiP mode with an MLB.TV feed

custom_steps_separated.content: When the user re-launches the app from the device home screen or app folder
custom_steps_separated.expected:
Then depending on what activity they were in when they sent the previous video to the PiP window, 
they will see that activity

custom_steps_separated.content: When the user taps to launch VOD content (i.e. video highlight, scoreboard highlight, Gameday video), while the original MLB.TV feed is in PiP mode
custom_steps_separated.expected:
Then the PiP window will maximize to full screen
and the newly selected VOD content will load and begin to play in full screen

custom_steps_separated.content: When the user taps the back button while the newly selected video content is playing in full screen
custom_steps_separated.expected: Then the user will be brought back to where they had launched the new video

custom_steps_separated.content: When the user taps the back button a second time
custom_steps_separated.expected: Then the stack will pop as should be intuitively expected

custom_preconds:
Given At Bat is installed on a device running OS 8.0 or higher
and the user has activated PiP mode with an MLB.TV feed

custom_steps_separated.content: When the user re-launches the app from the device home screen or app folder
custom_steps_separated.expected:
Then depending on what activity they were in when they sent the previous video to the PiP window, 
they will see that activity

custom_steps_separated.content: When the user taps to launch the MLB Network linear stream or an ad-hoc stream, while the original MLB.TV feed is in PiP mode
custom_steps_separated.expected:
Then the PiP window will maximize to full screen
and the newly selected content will load and begin to play in full screen

custom_steps_separated.content: When the user taps the back button while the newly selected video content is playing in full screen
custom_steps_separated.expected: Then the user will be brought back to where they had launched the new video

custom_steps_separated.content: When the user taps the back button a second time
custom_steps_separated.expected: Then the stack will pop as should be intuitively expected

title: Launching another Video Highlight
custom_preconds:
Given At Bat is installed on a device running OS 8.0 or higher
and the user has activated PiP mode with a video highlight (i.e. video index, scoreboard highlight, Gameday video)

custom_steps_separated.content: When the user re-launches the app from the device home screen or app folder
custom_steps_separated.expected:
Then depending on what activity they were in when they sent the previous video to the PiP window, 
they will see that activity

custom_steps_separated.content: When the user taps to launch another Video highlight, while the original video is in PiP mode
custom_steps_separated.expected:
Then the PiP window will maximize to full screen
and the newly selected video highlight will load and begin to play in full screen

custom_steps_separated.content: When the user taps to launch the same Video highlight, while the original video is in PiP mode
custom_steps_separated.expected:
Then the PiP window will maximize to full screen
and the newly selected video highlight will load and begin to play in full screen

custom_steps_separated.content: When the user taps the back button while the newly selected video is playing in full screen
custom_steps_separated.expected: Then the user will be brought back to where they had launched the new video

custom_steps_separated.content: When the user taps the back button a second time
custom_steps_separated.expected: Then the stack will pop as should be intuitively expected

custom_steps_separated.content: When the user taps to launch any other type of video during their app session
custom_steps_separated.expected:
Then the video will launch without issue
and the app will not crash

title: Lite User ---- NOT YET, NEED PRODUCT INPUT
custom_preconds:
Given At Bat is installed on a device running OS version 8.0 or higher
and the user is not logged in with an entitled account (Lite user)

custom_steps_separated.content: When the LITE user taps to launch a video highlight
custom_steps_separated.expected: Then a pre-roll ad should begin to play first

custom_steps_separated.content: When the Lite user taps the device home button while the pre-roll ad is playing
custom_steps_separated.expected: Then PiP mode will be activated and the pre-roll ad will continue to play in the PiP window
